thread.title: Clean, comfortable, in a great area with helpful staff
thread.title_full: Clean, comfortable, in a great area with helpful staff - Review of Royal Magda Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: hannahlF6642JD
title: Clean, comfortable, in a great area with helpful staff
text:
I stayed in the suite with my mum for a quick weekend city break and we stayed here upon recommendation from a friend. The staff were so helpful - recommended great restaurants and were very friendly and reliable. The room itself was so clean with a very comfortable bed. In terms of price, it was a little on the expensive side which is to be expected given the beautiful location ( a stone throw away from the Arc de Triomph, Champs Ã‰lysees). We walked everywhere because it was in such an excellent location with loads of local cafes and a fresh food market nearby. The hotel itself was on a pretty quiet street which is surprising given the noise and business in the area generally - but in the hotel there was no outside noise.
I did hear some noise from the people who were next to us but I was on the sofa bed. In the bedroom, it's very quiet. I would really recommend this for business or pleasure, it's so clean and central, with all amenities you could need.
